short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expand Expandable content in Quickbooks support articles without the need to click on each title.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet QuickExpand â€“ your time-saving companion for navigating the ins and outs of QuickBooks support articles effortlessly.
No more clicking to expand each section! 
With QuickExpand, a simple keyboard shortcut (Alt + X) is all it takes to unveil the full content of any QuickBooks Support article. 
Save time and boost your productivity. 
Combined with fast search (Ctrl + F), you can navigate and find information in QuickBooks Support articles with unparalleled efficiency.

No data is stored or shared, ensuring a secure and reliable extension that respects your online privacy. Your information stays yours.

Note: This version works on all expandable content except the hyperlinked ones. New version will be released as soon as possible for hyperlinked expandable content.
